message.content: Let me view the update_feed_url function to see the cache invalidation issue:

content:
Here's the result of running `cat -n` on /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py:
   842	def update_feed_url(feed_id):
   843	    """Updates a feed's URL and name."""
   844	    # Find feed or return 404
   845	    feed = db.get_or_404(Feed, feed_id)
   846	    
   847	    data = request.get_json()
   848	    # Validate input
   849	    if not data or 'url' not in data or not data['url'].strip():
   850	        return jsonify({'error': 'Missing feed URL'}), 400
   851	    
   852	    new_url = data['url'].strip()
   853	    
   854	    # Check if the new URL is already used by another feed
   855	    existing_feed = Feed.query.filter(Feed.id != feed_id, Feed.url == new_url).first()
   856	    if existing_feed:
   857	        return jsonify({'error': f'Feed with URL {new_url} already exists'}), 409 # Conflict
   858	    
   859	    try:
   860	        # Attempt to fetch the feed to get its title
   861	        parsed_feed = fetch_feed(new_url)
   862	        if not parsed_feed or not parsed_feed.feed:
   863	            # If fetch fails, use the URL as the name
   864	            new_name = new_url
   865	            new_site_link = None
   866	            logger.warning(f"Could not fetch title for {new_url}, using URL as name.")
   867	        else:
   868	            new_name = parsed_feed.feed.get('title', new_url) # Use URL as fallback if title missing
   869	            new_site_link = parsed_feed.feed.get('link') # Get the website link
   870	        
   871	        # Update the feed
   872	        original_url = feed.url
   873	        feed.url = new_url
   874	        feed.name = new_name
   875	        feed.site_link = new_site_link
   876	        feed.last_updated_time = datetime.datetime.now(datetime.timezone.utc)
   877	        
   878	        db.session.commit()
   879	        
   880	        # Trigger update to fetch new items
   881	        try:
   882	            success, new_items = fetch_and_update_feed(feed.id)
   883	            if success and new_items > 0:
   884	                invalidate_tab_feeds_cache(feed.tab_id)
   885	                logger.info(f"Cache invalidated for tab {feed.tab_id} after updating feed {feed.id}.")
   886	        except Exception as update_e:
   887	            # Log error during update but don't fail the operation
   888	            logger.error(f"Error updating feed {feed.id} after URL change: {update_e}", exc_info=True)
   889	        
   890	        logger.info(f"Updated feed {feed_id} from '{original_url}' to '{new_url}'.")
   891	        
   892	        # Return full feed data including items for frontend to update widget
   893	        feed_data = feed.to_dict()
   894	        # Include only recent feed items in the response (limit to 10)
   895	        feed_data['items'] = [item.to_dict() for item in feed.items.order_by(FeedItem.published_time.desc()).limit(10)]
   896	        return jsonify(feed_data), 200 # OK
   897	        
   898	    except Exception as e:
   899	        db.session.rollback()
   900	        logger.error(f"Error updating feed {feed_id}: {str(e)}", exc_info=True)
